testCases.testCaseDescription: Verify login functionality with valid credentials
testCases.expectedResult: User should be logged in successfully

testCases.testCaseDescription: Verify login functionality with invalid credentials
testCases.expectedResult: User should see an error message indicating invalid credentials

testSteps: Login to the application with valid credentials
testCases.expectedResult: User should be logged out and redirected to the login page
testCases.actualResult: User logged out and redirected to the login page
